author: m.kalinin
content:
I was thinking about 7685 as a simplification on EL side as <@792822129019584562> has mentioned. CL parsing RLP isn't desirable IMO, to avoid the necessity of that and abstract away from many other things we have the engine API.

I think the only decision we should make is to either have each request type in a separate list or have all requests in a single list dynamically typed. I am slightly in favour of the former but not standing strong on it. Separate lists are nice because it would encapsulate 7685 implementation into EL clients. On the other hand, it is in CL's "interest" to read all those requests and from that perspective keeping them in a single list sounds like a good middle ground
